channel.title: Troubleshooting
channel.description: If you're having trouble with Infiltration, whatever it might involve, post it here. Install problems, hosting a server, or configuring the game, this is the spot.

item.title: Can't get the mod to even launch on Windows 10
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rateedus)
item.dc:creator: Rateedus
item.content:encoded: I'm using unreal tournament GOTY edition and Infiltration 2.9 2013 CE. I get to the point where it loads the enb and then it crashes with "Infiltration.exe has stopped working".

item.title: Major (arguable) bug in Community Edition 2013
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ironword300)
item.dc:creator: Ironword300
item.content:encoded:
I've found a serious problem with Community Edition 2013. This is in addition to the issues identified in https://forums.beyondunreal.com/threads/inf-2-9-ce-2013-game-breaking-bug.201789/ (Note: I did not play enough to confirm or disconfirm those issues--as the paragraphs below will make clear, I never even got that far.)

To be fair, the CE2013 compilers may have considered the following problem a "feature". But it is such a major change in UT99 client-side operation that it...

Major (arguable) bug in Community Edition 2013

item.title: Inf 2.9 CE 2011 Issue...
item.author: invalid@example.com (The Great Sephiroth)
item.dc:creator: The Great Sephiroth
item.content:encoded:
I reinstalled the official Inf 2.9 CE and then downloaded the 2011 CE. I installed the 2011 CE to a new folder (no UT folder or anything) just to see why the 2011 CE and newer screw up so badly on my server. The answer is simple. Whomever designed the 2011 CE did not check their work. The Inf Mod Weapon Pack is installed in both Infiltration\Community\System AND Infiltration\System. There are MANY other duplicates as well, some going into what would be the UT system folder....

Inf 2.9 CE 2011 Issue...

item.title: 40mm HEDP Grenade
item.author: invalid@example.com (walmic)
item.dc:creator: walmic
item.content:encoded:
Hello to all who read that
I have a question about the 40mm HEDP grenades from "WeaponPack 1.61 Update". Is there any method to use this grenades in the game? I can add the 40mm HEDP grenades in the Loadout to my equipment but these grenades lack then in the game. I've tried it through the mutator list. Without any success.



Regards walmic

item.title: Problem with Textures in OpenGL
item.author: invalid@example.com (Coop-Stogie)
item.dc:creator: Coop-Stogie
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone.

Started ot work on my map again, but i have some issues with masekd textures.
Textures are shown fine in editor, ingame under DirectD3D, but they turn translucent under OpenGL. Anyone knows how to fix? (Use original UT textures btw).

Greets Stogie

item.title: PsyTex faces
item.author: invalid@example.com (vitamin)
item.dc:creator: vitamin
item.content:encoded:
I can't get them working when I have balaclava in the loudout. I mean, balaclava is not visible at all. But if I remove it from loadout and add rag, then it seems to work (both rag and balaclava, which is a bit strange). Anyone have same or similar problems maybe?

Also I don't know why but I got no balaclavas with 3 holes as seen below. Does anyone know how to enable them in game?

item.title: AimView corrupts textures
item.author: invalid@example.com (vitamin)
item.dc:creator: vitamin
item.content:encoded:
After adding 'AimView' to my mutators list I cannot zoom in because textures go missing. Please see sceenshots below:




My vga is Radeon x1650 Pro (512MB) and here's my INF config:

Code:
[D3D9Drv.D3D9RenderDevice]
ZRangeHack=True
NumAASamples=2
UseAA=True
RequestHighResolutionZ=True
UseSoftwareVertexProcessing=False
UsePureDevice=True
UseTripleBuffering=True
MaskedTextureHack=True...
AimView corrupts textures

item.title: No preview for M93R
item.author: invalid@example.com (vitamin)
item.dc:creator: vitamin
item.content:encoded: I got no preview image for this pistol (and magazine too). Can it be fixed somehow?

item.title: Inf 2.9 CE 2013 Game-Breaking Bug...
item.author: invalid@example.com (The Great Sephiroth)
item.dc:creator: The Great Sephiroth
item.content:encoded:
Infiltration 2.9 CE 2013 is bugged in a way that prevents it from being used both as a server or a client on Linux and Mac systems.
Code:
Spawning: TF2.TickFix
appError called:
Can't bind to native class TF2.TickFix
Executing UObject::StaticShutdownAfterError
UClass::Bind
(Class TF2.TickFix)
ULinkerLoad::CreateExport
(TickFix 1130)
ULinkerLoad::Create
UObject::StaticLoadObject
(Core.Class TF2.TickFix NULL)
UObject::StaticLoadClass
ULevel::Listen
Listen
UGameEngine::LoadMap
LocalMapURL...
Inf 2.9 CE 2013 Game-Breaking Bug...

item.title: A few Inf 2.9 CE problems...
item.author: invalid@example.com (The Great Sephiroth)
item.dc:creator: The Great Sephiroth
item.content:encoded:
I have a few issues here. I am running Inf 2.9 CE with the Bonus Pack, INFMOD weaponpack 1.5.1 (cannot find 1.6.0 or 1.6.1 as a full download, only an update which does not have everything that I need), and I have a few issue that are bugging me.

First, when I use the menu to vote in a new location the time limit gets changed from 18 minutes to 8 minutes! It shouldn't even be 18 since I have 20 set in the ini file. This is for a team game. Why on earth is it changing my time limit? Also,...

A few Inf 2.9 CE problems...

item.title: Go home server browser you're drunk
item.author: invalid@example.com (ShadowFear)
item.dc:creator: ShadowFear
item.content:encoded:
[SCREENSHOT]http://i.imgur.com/YyiajMx.jpg[/SCREENSHOT]

YOU WERE WORKING JUST FINE THE OTHER DAY!

item.title: Mouse performance
item.author: invalid@example.com (Psychomorph)
item.dc:creator: Psychomorph
item.content:encoded:
I noticed I have strong negative acceleration in INF. That means if I turn around very fast, the mouse speed slows down significantly and I turn only half the way as I would if I was moving the mouse slower.
I don't have this in UT.

I tried a Diamondback 3G and Zowie AM, both have this.

Any ideas how to fix this?

item.title: WeaponPack 1.6.1
item.author: invalid@example.com (Psychomorph)
item.dc:creator: Psychomorph
item.content:encoded:
I can't get it to work offline. Weapons aren't there, but it is added in the mutator list.
If I change the files back to WP1.5.1 it automatically changes in the mutator list and I can use the WP weapons offline.

item.title: Field of View
item.author: invalid@example.com (Psychomorph)
item.dc:creator: Psychomorph
item.content:encoded:
INF's fov is locked on 90°, which is good for 4:3 monitors, but I use a 16:9 monitor and need a fov of 105°. With the transolcator you can change the fov in console, but as soon as you switch to the INF weapons the fov goes back to 90.

Is there a way to do it?

item.title: Walking/running problem in LAN game
item.author: invalid@example.com (nu1oh)
item.dc:creator: nu1oh
item.content:encoded:
Did anyone experience this?

In a LAN game (local war works fine) the player stops every 10 or so metres when walking or running, the walking animation continues but he doesn't actually move but stays where he is as if he was stuck. This keeps repeating on and on so that the game is totally unplayable. Ping time is <1ms.

item.title: Problems with UT and Infiltration on Win7 x64
item.author: invalid@example.com (doveman)
item.dc:creator: doveman
item.content:encoded:
I've got the GOG version of UT v4.36 and I've installed the OldUnreal Multimedia patches the Enhanced Renderers and the D3D10 Renderers . I've also checked DirectX is up-to-date and the Visual C++ 2010 runtimes are installed.

I've tried starting UT with various renderers but if I type preferences in the console and then click on one of the categories...

Problems with UT and Infiltration on Win7 x64

item.title: Door Breaching Charge
item.author: invalid@example.com (syythe)
item.dc:creator: syythe
item.content:encoded: ive noticed when i go to use a DBC i can only pick it up..is this feature disabled currently? if its active can someone tell me how to get it to blow up a door? i expected it to be similar to a claymore

item.title: Missing Weapons/Equipment
item.author: invalid@example.com (syythe)
item.dc:creator: syythe
item.content:encoded:
this isn't a question just a report of some things ive noticed, mainly involving what weapons you take and what effects it can cause on your loadout. i've noticed that the mini/micro uzi tend to take away binocs and the blackberry and possibly other equipment. some SMGs with suppressors also take away the binocs (edit) even the stock support on the micro uzi takes away binocs. if you are missing a weapon or equipment try to remove any suppressors and weapons until the equipment returns.

i...

Missing Weapons/Equipment
